extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from MATH120; MATH121; MATH122; MATH123; MATH124; MATH126

basic.description:
Differentiation and integration of the elementary functions with applications to the social sciences and economics; Taylor polynomials; multivariable differential calculus. 
NOTE    Primarily intended for students in the BAH program. Students in the BSCH, BCMPH and BCOM programs should not enrol in this course.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Differential and Integral Calculus
